alert.note: Alert for Harnett (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harnett County through 330 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lillington, moving east at 20 mph. Some areas in northern Harnett County have already received one to two inches of rain from an earlier thunderstorm. An additional inch of rain is possible. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding water on roadways and other low-lying areas. Locations impacted include... Lillington, Dunn, Angier, Erwin, Coats, Seminole, Raven Rock State Park, Buies Creek and Duncan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
